introduction.name: MediaWiKi
introduction.author: MediaWiKi ＆＆ Jieming Mao
introduction.description:
MediaWiki 是一套以GPL授权发行的Wiki引擎。

它具有很丰富的功能，并被维基百科及其他维基媒体基金会的计划所采用，亦为世界上很多不同的维基所采用。

appconfig.tpl:
name: <<appname>> version: <<version>>
handle:
#http://sae.sina.com.cn/doc/php/runtime.html#php-app-config #URL Rewrite - hostaccess: if(path ~ "/cache/") deny "*" - hostaccess: if(path ~ "/includes/") deny "*" - hostaccess: if(path ~ "/languages/") deny "*" - hostaccess: if(path ~ "/maintenance/") deny "*" - hostaccess: if(path ~ "/match/") deny "*" - hostaccess: if(path ~ "/serialized/") deny "*" - hostaccess: if(path ~ "/maintenance/archives/") deny "*" - rewrite: if( query_string ~ "/(.*):(.*)" ) goto "/index.php/$1:$2" - rewrite: if( !is_file() && !is_dir() && query_string !~ "index\.php" ) goto "index.php/{QUERY_STRING}" ...
